title: Maintenance work on Sengkang LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 盛港轻轨系统维修工作
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan di sistem LRT Sengkang

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance work on the Sengkang LRT system this Sunday, 1 July 2018. 

Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 5.30pm. https://t.co/32nNMK46MJ
